name: Island Boy Impact 2 - 3D Action Adventure Game
name_original: Island Boy Impact 2 - 3D Action Adventure Game
description:
Island Boy Impact 2 is a free to play third person 3D adventure game like no other taking place within the amazing Island of Mauritius.
The evil giant turtles have overtaken the Island of Mauritius and you are the only hope for the helpless village people.
Within the game you will explore and discover various beautiful handcrafted 3D levels filled with various magical items and quests.
- Travel through breathtaking platformer levels and experience intense battle against fantasy creatures.
- Level up your character and unlock new amazing yet more difficult levels.
- Play with your own unique style against fully responsive AI alongside modern innovative gameplay system specially built for mobile gaming.
- Collect as much food as you can to maximize your chance of survival as your fight against a variety of unusual and dangerous fantasy creatures.
- Discover hidden places and quests as you explore the eye candy 3D environments the game offers.
- Don't get too close to the enemies as they won't hesitate to attack you or send projectiles. Watch your back, the Evil Turtles won't hesitate to shoot in the back.
- Island Boy Impact is the perfect challenge for you and your friends. See who among you will be able to beat the various Platformer 3D levels the game provides first.

Island Boy Impact 2 game features:
1 - Beautiful 3D environment with different climate and realistic plants and trees 3D models.
2 - Experience very smooth and responsive touch control system.
3 - Battle against intelligent enemies who respond to what you do.
4 - High quality realistic sound effect.
5 - Astounding visual effects and light system.
6 - High quality music and sounds.
7 - Experience AAA platformer gameplay and graphics rarely seen before within a free to play indie game.
8 - Fun for all ages.

PLEASE NOTE:
- The game can be played offline. You don't need internet to play the game
- The game is free to play.
- The game contains advertising.

Developer: Stephane Jolicoeur
Location: Mauritius
